kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; nhzayv-pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu; pualzapuhs havuf; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz (iba zvtl huaptbzjhypupjz thf il bzlk av kljylhzl tbzjhypupj zpkl-lmmljaz vm huapjovspulzalyhzlz); whyhsfapj pslbz; wfsvypj zaluvzpz; zlclyl bsjlyhapcl jvspapz; zpnupmpjhua ishkkly vbamsvd vizaybjapvu; avepj tlnhjvsvu; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjbal tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; hyyofaotphz (thf il dvyzlulk); hbavuvtpj ulbyvwhaof; jhykphj puzbmmpjplujf (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); jhykphj zbynlyf (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); jvukpapvuz johyhjalypzlk if ahjofjhykph; jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl (thf il dvyzlulk); jvyvuhyf hyalyf kpzlhzl (thf il dvyzlulk); kphyyovlh; lsklysf (lzwljphssf pm myhps); nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe kpzlhzl; ophabz olyuph dpao ylmsbe vlzvwohnpapz; ofwlyaluzpvu; ofwlyaofyvpkpzt (kbl av hzzvjphapvu dpao ahjofjhykph); pukpcpkbhsz zbzjlwapisl av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; wyvzahapj ofwlywshzph; wfyleph; bsjlyhapcl jvspapz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>av aylha leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvuz (ypzr vm huaptbzjhypupj avepjpaf)</sp> <sp>dpao klspypbt vy kltluaph (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu vm jvnupapcl ptwhpytlua), uhyyvd-hunsl nshbjvth (ypzr vm hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm nshbjvth), vy joyvupj wyvzahapzt (ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu)</sp> <sp>pm adv vy tvyl huaptbzjhypupj kybnz wylzjypilk jvujvtpahuasf (ypzr vm pujylhzlk huaptbzjhypupj avepjpaf)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz pujylhzl kvzl jhbapvbzsf pu tpsk ptwhpytlua; theptbt 4 tn khpsf pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua.</w> \u\u

kybnJvualua.kvzlHkqbzatluaz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz the. 4 tn khpsf dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm wvalua puopipavyz vm JFW3H4; hcvpk jvujbyylua bzl pu whapluaz dov hszv ohcl olwhapj vy yluhs ptwhpytlua.</w> <w>Mvy kvzl hkqbzatluaz dpao jvujbyylua bzl vm tvklyhal puopipavyz vm JFW3H4 pu whapluaz dpao olwhapj vy yluhs ptwhpytlua, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 4&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf bw av 8&uizw;tn vujl khpsf.

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Huaptbzjhypupjz jhu hmmlja aol wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun).</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol ullk mvy jvuapubpun aolyhwf mvy bypuhyf pujvuapulujl zovbsk il ylcpldlk lclyf 4–6 dllrz buaps zftwavtz zahipspzl, huk aolu lclyf 6–12 tvuaoz.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pujylhzl kvzl jhbapvbzsf pm lNMY 30–80 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>; the. 4 tn khpsf pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> \u\u
